fields.answer_value: API stands for Application Programming interface.
A Fetch Api provides you with a fetch() method to initiate the request to another service on the World Wide Web

fields.question_text: Describe coupling and why it is something you want to avoid when programming?
fields.question_display: Describe coupling and why it is something you want to avoid when programming?
fields.answer_value: Coupling refers to how many components know about the existence of each other and how restrictive the interactions are. Components that are coupled, make refactoring code more difficult.

fields.question_text: Describe the use of the EventHub in javascript.
fields.question_display: Describe the use of the EventHub in javascript.
fields.answer_value: The EventHub is the agreed-upon location, typically the topmost DOM element where all components can broadcast custom messages to and other components needing to listen for another component would do it throught the eventhub.
Json-server is a tool used to run your own, local API in which you can manage data.

fields.question_text: What is the purpose of an ERD?
fields.question_display: What is the purpose of an ERD?
fields.answer_value: An ERD is used to visualize the relationships in a database.
